<style>

body{

    animation: gradient 15s ease infinite;
    background-size: 400% 400%;
    background-attachment: fixed;




}

@keyframes gradient {
    0% {
        background-position: 0% 0%;
    }
    50% {
        background-position: 100% 100%;
    }
    100% {
        background-position: 0% 0%;
    }
}

background: rgb(2,0,36);

-moz-border-radius: 0px 66px 0px 66px;

align-items: center;
}
